format: A data frame with 119 observations of the following variables.
description:
Description
Official snowfall data by month and season for Grand Rapids, MI, going back to 1893.
title: Snowfall data for Grand Rapids, MI
reference:
These data were compiled by Laura Kapitula from data available
from NOAA. The original URL used
(http://www.crh.noaa.gov/grr/climate/data/grr/snowfall/)
is no longer in service.

parameters.SeasonEnd: Year in which season ended (June is end of season)
parameters.SeasonStart: Year in which season started (July is start of season)
parameters.Total: Inches of snow for entire season (July-June)
